About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

A results oriented account executive with over 9 yearsâ€™ experience in account management, customer service and admin roles. I am currently working at Europcar Ireland in their international corporate team. I have numerous different responsibilites in this role and handle the many different aspects of manageing accounts resulting in one point of contact for any client request. I am focused on maximizing sales and improving customer experience by managing all clients systematically and logically. I am committed to the ideals of consistency and dedication in order to build the most successful business partnerships. I am known to pick up multiple new systems and procedures in a short amount of time and always strive to deliver.

Along with sales, customer service and account management I have aslo started to learn about web development technologies and some of my projects can be seen on the Work section of this website. I am looking to join a fun, innovative and forward thinking company to not only apply my current skillset but to develop new skills along the way.

Sales
At Europcar I am responsible for generating new business & retaining clients in the corporate car hire space. With a key focus on increasing inbound business from clients outside of Ireland, I also provide access to Europcar's international network for our domestic customers. I generate, negotiate and close leads from various sources including adwords, phone and through my own email campaigns. The aim is to provide our clients with a one stop shop for all their mobility needs, whether it be short or long term rental solutions or sourcing rates for projects in other countries. I also cross sell our other offerings including fleet management & resevration platforms, car hire by the hour through our sister company GoCar.
Salesforce, Zoho, MailChimp, Qlikview and Excel would be some of the tools I use in this area.

Key skills - Product Knowledge, Communication, Rapport Building, Negotiaton, Networking, Prospecting, Cross Selling, Closing.

Account Management
In terms of account managemnet I deal with clients on a number of different levels regarding their account with Europcar. At prospect stage I negotiate and source rates and hire solutions to suit specific requirements. I also provide one point of contact for any type of issue raised whether it be pricing requests or car breakdowns. I am also invovled in billing and collection - issuing invoices & statements, processing & allocating payments, resolving queries and reissuing invoices. I am with the client every step of the way from their first hire to their first invoice. This provides a peace of mind and a reassurance that clients know who to go to for any issues that may arise. I am also responsible for increasing, retaining and spreading awareness of our loyal customers program Europcar Privilege.
Rental systems, Excel, Qlikview, SQL, Word, Realex Payments would be some of the tools I use in this area.

Key skills - Relationship Building, Dispute Resolution, Problem Solving, Research, Detail Oriented, Customer Focused, Interpersonal.

Web Development
Web Development has been something that has really interested me for a number of years, this year I finally made the plunge to learn more about the technologies out there and use them create new things that benefit myself and others. So far I have a good grasp of frontend technologies including - HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, SASS, Vanilla JS and the basics of Angular. I have been using these new skills to put together websites, web apps and useful tools to help clients & colleagues. Some of the projects that I have been working on recently can be found in the Work section, with a link to my code on GitHub. One of the bigger projects that I am currently working on alone is an all in one web rostering app - the idea is to make it easier to create, publish, send & amend rosters for staff. Ideally I would be looking to bring these skills into a new account management position & create new tools & apps geared towards improving sales & customer experience.
Atom, Bootstrap, SASS, Angular & Github would be some of the tools I use in this area.

Key Skills - Frontend Technologies, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Bootstrap, Javascript, Angular, GitHub, Color Philoshy, UI/UX Design.
